SumOfProgramRelatedInvestments.Description1: A Program Related Investment Loan was awarded to Great Hearts Academies {GHA}. GHA provides a K-12 preparatory academy through the charter school system. Charter is part of the public education system so there is no tuition for families. This allows many students the opportunity of this kind of education who could not afford a private preparatory academy. The PRI Loan terms are 3.5% for 5 years. The balance as of FYE 2-28-10 was $1,960,346.
